mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sp.* FROM SYS_USER_ROLE sur left join SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION srp on srp.ROLE_ID=sur.ROLE_ID left join SYS_PERMISSION sp on sp.ID=srp.PERMISSION_ID and sp.DEL_FLAG=0 and sp.STATUS=0 WHERE sp.TYPE=1 AND sp.PARENT_ID IS NULL and sur.LOGIN_NAME=#{personId} ORDER BY sp.SORT

SELECT DISTINCT sp.* FROM SYS_USER_ROLE sur left join SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION srp on srp.ROLE_ID=sur.ROLE_ID left join SYS_PERMISSION sp on sp.ID=srp.PERMISSION_ID and sp.DEL_FLAG=0 and sp.STATUS=0 WHERE sp.TYPE!=1 AND sp.PARENT_ID IS NOT NULL and sur.LOGIN_NAME=#{personId} ORDER BY sp.SORT
